articles.description: The late director William Friedkin made movies his way, no matter what changes transformed his industry. Was he the best director of the 1970s? Maybe. He was certainly the most 1970s director.
articles.content: Was William Friedkin the bestdirector of the 1970s? Maybe. He was certainly the most 1970s director, making 70s movies long after the 70s had ended. He entered the decade with an adaptation of Mart C… [+18729 chars]
